titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to encourage the entry of windbreaks and shelterbelts into the Conservation Reserve Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

bill.summary: 5/19/1988--Introduced. Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to coordinate with State and local entities to create incentives, including cost-sharing, for shelterbelts and windbreaks in the conservation reserve program.
